words.source: H559 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And he said', ESV 'he said', NASB 'he said' — all agree
H3205 prep + Piel inf cstr + 2fp suffix; KJV 'When ye do the office of a midwife', ESV 'When you serve as midwife', NASB 'When you are helping the Hebrew women to give birth' — all agree on midwifery
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5680 article + gentillic noun fem pl abs; KJV 'the Hebrew women', ESV 'the Hebrew women', NASB 'the Hebrew women' — all agree
H7200 conj + Qal perf 2fp; KJV 'and see them', ESV 'and see them', NASB 'and see them' — all agree
H5921 preposition; KJV 'upon', ESV 'on', NASB 'on' — all agree

H70 article + noun masc dual abs 'the two stones (of the birthstool)'; KJV 'upon the stools' (DIVERGENT), ESV 'on the birthstool', NASB 'on the birthstool' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV diverges with plural 'stools'
H518 conjunction; KJV 'if', ESV 'if', NASB 'if' — all agree
H1121 noun masc sg abs; KJV 'it be a son', ESV 'it is a son', NASB 'it is a son' — all agree
H1931 personal pronoun 3ms; KJV omits, ESV omits, NASB omits — copular pronoun, absorbed into English 'it is'
H4191 conj + Hiphil perf 2fp; KJV 'then ye shall kill', ESV 'you shall kill', NASB 'then you shall put…to death' — all agree on killing
H853 direct object marker + 3ms suffix; KJV 'him', ESV 'him', NASB 'him' — all agree
H518 conj + conjunction; KJV 'but if', ESV 'but if', NASB 'but if' — all agree
H1323 noun fem sg abs; KJV 'it be a daughter', ESV 'it is a daughter', NASB 'it is a daughter' — all agree
H1931 personal pronoun 3fs; copular pronoun; KJV omits, ESV omits, NASB omits — absorbed into English
H2425 conj + Qal perf 3fs; KJV 'then she shall live', ESV 'she shall live', NASB 'let her live' — all agree
